sentences.sContent: The body is fiberglass and carbon fiber.
sentences.sContent_eng: The body is fiberglass and carbon fiber.
sentences.sCn: 车身材料为玻璃纤维和碳纤维。

sentences.sContent: This generally takes two or three days for plaster casts, and an hour for fiberglass casts.
sentences.sContent_eng: This generally takes two or three days for plaster casts, and an hour for fiberglass casts.
sentences.sCn: 对于石膏板，大约要两三天，而玻璃纤维夹板则仅仅只用一个小时。

sentences.sContent: If the centerboard is not weighted, like the fiberglass centerboards of many small sailboats, then sailors must keep the boat upright by positioning their own weight on the upwind side of the boat.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the centerboard is not weighted, like the fiberglass centerboards of many small sailboats, then sailors must keep the boat upright by positioning their own weight on the upwind side of the boat.
sentences.sCn: 如果活动龙骨不带负重，例如许多小型帆船使用的玻璃纤维活动龙骨，那么水手们必须通过将他们自己的体重压在船只的逆风侧来保持船只直立。

words.tran: [医] 纤维性颤动，[生物] 原纤维形成
[生化] 纤维蛋白原；纤朊原
